response_requirements.initial_response_description: Custodian has reasonable time to determine if records are subject to access and permit inspection; cannot exceed 3 business days
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If oral and written request made for same records, written request controls and 3-day period starts when written request received

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge for research, retrieval, redaction at lowest paid employee rate; first quarter hour free
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Maximum $0.10/page for 8.5x14 or smaller; actual cost for larger
fee_structure.fee_estimate_required: If estimated cost exceeds $25, must notify requester within 3 days
fee_structure.deposit_requirement: May require 50% deposit if estimated cost exceeds $500

exemptions.description: Records specifically required by federal or state statute to be kept confidential
Medical or veterinary records where disclosure would be invasion of personal privacy
Records compiled for law enforcement that would disclose confidential source, investigative material, or endanger life/safety
Specific investigative files concerning pending investigations (suspended investigations become public)
Social security numbers, credit/debit card info, bank accounts, passwords, financial data, unlisted phone numbers, personal email
Passwords, keys, alarm codes, entry codes for secured areas
Trade secrets or commercially valuable information of private entities
Records developed for litigation covered by attorney-client privilege

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal; direct court action for enforcement
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Reasonable attorney fees and expenses of litigation awarded if requester substantially prevails

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May submit orally or in writing; written request controls if both submitted

agency_obligations.response_format_options: May provide electronic copies or printouts from databases; must use existing programs
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Broadly construed to allow inspection; exceptions interpreted narrowly
agency_obligations.denial_requirements: Must notify of denial with specific legal authority (Code section, subsection, paragraph) within 3 business days

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Georgia statute. 3 business day maximum response time. Maximum $0.10/page for standard copies. May charge hourly rate for research/retrieval after first 15 minutes. If cost exceeds $25 must notify within 3 days; may require 50% deposit if exceeds $500. Residency requirement - must be Georgia citizen. No administrative appeal - direct to Superior Court. Attorney fees if substantially prevails. Strong presumption favoring disclosure; exceptions narrowly construed.
